Значения

Группа, команда, бригада

Мнемоника

На грифе струнного музыкального инструмента с колками 王 делаются насечки для ладов ножом 刂. Готовые инструменты настраивались в унисон и для продажи расставлялись в ряд. Группа. В военном деле — смена караула по звуковому сигналу.

Elaboration: The inscription from the " knife " to the " jue " means that the jade is divided into two by the knife. The original meaning is to divide the jade, and the extension is to separate. "Said Wen": "Class, divide Ruiyu. From 𤤴 from the knife." Ruiyu is a thing used as a voucher in ancient times. It is divided into two, each holding one (Tang Kejing).

Bronze writing is used as the name of the person, and the sling: "The sling (the uncle) is the same as the (as) the sling (uncle) the class travel must (盨)".

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period are also used as the names of people. Jie Gong" Jane 12: "Mao Class". See also in Bangui. Maogongban, also known as Uncle Mao, was a military general under King Mu of the Western Zhou Dynasty. Its great-grandfather was Mao Shuzheng, the son of King Zhou Wen (the first king of Mao Kingdom). Therefore, King Mu called the Ban as Father Mao (Wang Wenyao). "The Biography of Mu Tianzi": "Most Maoban and Panggu come first to Zhou, waiting for the fate of heaven."
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The inscription from the " sword " to the " jue " means that the jade is divided into two by the knife.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「刀」從「珏」，表示以刀把玉一分為二，本義是切分玉塊，引申為分開。《說文》：「班，分瑞玉。从𤤴从刀。」瑞玉是古代用作憑證的東西，中分為二，各執其一(湯可敬)。

　　金文用作人名，弭弔盨：「弭弔(叔)乍(作)弔(叔)班旅須(盨)」。

　　戰國竹簡亦用作人名，《清華簡一．祭公》簡12：「毛班」。又見於班簋。毛公班，亦稱毛伯，是西周穆王時的軍事將領，其曾祖父是周文王之子毛叔鄭(毛國的始封君)。故穆王稱班為毛父(王文耀)。《穆天子傳》：「命毛班、逄固先至于周，以待天之命。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「刀」從「珏」，表示以刀把玉一分為二，本義是切分玉塊，引申為分開。

2) смена, вахта, дежурство; очередь

3) рейс; рейсовый
你搭下一班飞机吧 летите следующим рейсом (самолётом)

Radicals: 王, 刂  (king, knife)
Meaning Mnemonic
If the king gives you a knife you become part of his squad. Every king has a knife squad or two protecting him and making sure his subjects keep in line.
Imagine if you were given a knife and allowed into the king's squad. Would you let the power corrupt you?
Reading Mnemonic
This squad is led by Han (はん) Solo, so it's basically a 50/50 shot that the king is gonna die.
I'm not saying Han Solo is a bad squad leader, but his track record isn't the greatest. I mean, best case scenario the king gets stabbed in the arm and they manage to win.
